titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 41976D0755 English

76/755/ECSC, EEC, Euratom: Decision of the Council and of the representatives of the Governments of the Member States of the European Communities, meeting within the Council, of 20 September 1976 on practical measures of economic cooperation within the EC-Canada Joint Committee

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 76/755/ECSC, EEC, Euratom: Decision of the Council and of the representatives of the Governments of the Member States of the European Communities, meeting within the Council, of 20 September 1976 on practical measures of economic cooperation within the EC-Canada Joint Committee
body.p: DECISION OF THE COUNCIL AND OF THE REPRESENTATIVES OF THE GOVERNMENTS OF THE MEMBER STATES OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES, MEETING WITHIN THE COUNCIL of 20 September 1976 on practical measures of economic cooperation within the EC-Canada Joint Committee (76/755/ECSC, EEC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES AND THE REPRESENTATIVES OF THE GOVERNMENTS OF THE MEMBER STATES, MEETING WITHIN THE COUNCIL,

That practical measures of economic cooperation may not be initiated by the Community within the EC-Canada Joint Committee unless a common position has been agreed beforehand under the Community's usual procedures ; this proviso will apply in all circumstances, irrespective of the extent to which a common policy already exists for the sector concerned.
